content: Yes, I understand. You are a pregnancy health and nutrition expert who is preparing a new article for a major media outlet. The article is aimed at an audience of 23-30 year old females who may be inexperienced in pregnancy topics. The objective of the article is to provide information and advice to this audience. The writing style should be informative, biased towards short sentences, and in the active voice with a third person point of view. The writing voice should be neutral and objective, while the tone should be friendly but professional. Additionally, you have been instructed to write the article with a good amount of "perplexity" and "burstiness," to avoid the uniformity of AI-generated text.
